parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

datasetStructure: One record per recorded intervention occurrence or constant treatment interval per subject

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to identify a subject uniquely across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.SPDEVID

datasetVariables.description: It must be unique for each tracked unit of the device under study, and can be at whatever level of granularity the device should be identified (e.g., model or serial number, or combination of identifiers).
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor Device Identifier
datasetVariables.name: SPDEVID

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXSEQ

datasetVariables.description: May be any valid number. It should be unique within every subject/device combination.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: DXSEQ

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXGRPID

datasetVariables.description: For example, if a device is inserted that delivers radiation, DXGRPID could be used to tie the records for the device and the radiation together for each course of therapy.
datasetVariables.label: Group ID
datasetVariables.name: DXGRPID

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXSPID

datasetVariables.description: Examples: a number pre-printed on the CRF as an explicit line identifier or record identifier defined in the sponsor's operational database.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
datasetVariables.name: DXSPID

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXTRT

self.title: Name of Device Exposure or Output

datasetVariables.description: Example: coronary stent, extracorporeal shock wave treatment, hyaluronic acid
datasetVariables.label: Name of Device Exposure or Output
datasetVariables.name: DXTRT

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXCAT

datasetVariables.description: For example, for a subject who had radiation delivered through an implanted catheter, DXCAT could be used to group the radiation records vs. the catheter records.
datasetVariables.label: Category for Device Exposure
datasetVariables.name: DXCAT

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXSCAT

datasetVariables.description: If DXCAT captures the radiation vs. catheter records (see DXCAT), then DXSCAT might capture the type of catheter if more than one was used.
datasetVariables.label: Subcategory for Device Exposure
datasetVariables.name: DXSCAT

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXDOSE

datasetVariables.description: Dose if captured as a numeric value. Dose should only appear once in DXDOSE, DXDOSTXT or DXDOSTOT
datasetVariables.label: Exposure per Administration
datasetVariables.name: DXDOSE

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXDOSTXT

datasetVariables.description: Units may be stored in DXDOSU. Example: 200-400, 15-20. Dose should only appear once in DXDOSE, DXDOSTXT or DXDOSTOT
datasetVariables.label: Device Exposure Description
datasetVariables.name: DXDOSTXT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXDOSU

datasetVariables.description: Examples: pulses, ml
datasetVariables.label: Device Exposure Units
datasetVariables.name: DXDOSU

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXDOSFRQ

datasetVariables.label: Device Exposure Frequency per Interval
datasetVariables.name: DXDOSFRQ

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXDOSTOT

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXDOSRGM

datasetVariables.description: Examples: TWO WEEKS ON, TWO WEEKS OFF.

datasetVariables.description: Examples: EXTRACORPOREAL, INTRA-ARTICULAR, HEMODIALYSIS

datasetVariables.name: DXROUTE

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXLOC

datasetVariables.description: Examples: Left knee, OD

description: An interventions domain that contains a subject's exposure to a medical device under study. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102617, 2018-06-29)
label: Device Exposure
name: DX
